p: Several NPs extracted from plants were proven effective against viral infections, including those from coronaviruses (CoVs), coxsackieviruses, enterovirus 71, dengue, hepatitis B, hepatitis C, herpes simplex, human immunodeficiency (HIV-1) and influenza viruses ( Lin et al., 2014). For example, secondary metabolites from green tea ( Steinmann et al., 2013), cinnamon ( Connell et al., 2016) and curcumin (extracted from turmeric) ( Praditya et al., 2019), showed action against different viruses (HIV-1, human papillomavirus, hepatitis, influenza, chikungunya, herpes simplex 2, and Zika viruses (ZIKV)).
